sentences.en: A joyous warmth began to relax his body.
sentences.cn: 一股可人的暖流渐渐熏得全身舒畅了.

sentences.en: After a joyous and restful three days, I left this beautiful city.
sentences.cn: 度过了愉快轻松的3天后，我离开了这个美丽的城市。

sentences.en: Mr. Elton must compose his joyous looks.
sentences.cn: 厄尔吞先生必须保持他欢乐的神色.

sentences.en: Our music is a joyous celebration of life.
sentences.cn: 我们的音乐是对生活的欢乐颂扬。

sentences.en: She had made their childhood so joyous and carefree.
sentences.cn: 她使他们的童年充满欢乐，无忧无虑。

sentences.en: She treasures her memories of those joyous days.
sentences.cn: 她珍视那段快乐时光的记忆。

sentences.en: Such thoughts shot through Byron Henry's mind with the joyous relief.
sentences.cn: 拜伦·享利怀着喜悦的轻松心情,脑子里掠过这些念头.

sentences.en: The astronaut was welcomed with joyous , resounding acclaim.
sentences.cn: 人们欢声雷动地迎接那位宇航员.

sentences.en: The bells rang a joyous peal.
sentences.cn: 铃儿发出欢乐的叮当声.

sentences.en: The lively dance heightened the joyous atmosphere of the scene.
sentences.cn: 轻快的舞蹈给这场戏渲染了欢乐气氛.

sentences.en: The streets were thronged with light vehicles and with joyous pleasure - seekers.
sentences.cn: 街上满是轻便车辆,还有寻欢作乐的快活人.

sentences.en: There is something frank and joyous and young in the area.
sentences.cn: 这个地区处处给人以豪放,乐观和蒸蒸日上的感觉.

sentences.en: They conveyed the joyous news to us soon.
sentences.cn: 他们把这一佳音很快地传递给我们.
我们都过着快乐的生活.

sentences.en: When she went out the sparrows were twittering merrily in joyous choruses.
sentences.cn: 她出门时,大群的麻雀在叽叽喳喳地欢唱.

sentences.en: With lighted face and joyous eyes she persecuted me.
sentences.cn: 她那张神采奕奕的脸孔和那双充满喜悦的眼睛折磨着我.

words.tran_cn: 令人高兴的；充满欢乐的（等于joyful）

trans.tran_cn: 快乐的，使人喜悦的，欢娱，喜庆
trans.tran_en: very happy, or likely to make people very happy
